articles.title: Guinness World Records recognised Elon Musk for the 'largest loss of personal fortune in history' - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: By one estimate, Musk lost as much as $200 billion in about a year, largely due to plummeting Tesla shares. Now, that's earned him a new world record.
articles.content:
